name: Welcome To Hell
description:
Experience horror in stunning 3D. Destroy waves of hellish undead zombies before they destroy you. Welcome to hell...will you survive?

FEATURES:
- Blood and gore delivered in stunning 3D.
- Multiple weapons to unlock.
- 3D sound positioning. Hear the horror come from behind!
- High quality sound effects with individual volume controls.
- Multiple languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, and Polish

GAME TRAILER:
See the game in action for yourself @ youtube.com/dvidearts
